bibl.title: Curtain, Shroud, Work of Art: Three Lives of a Textile Artifact in the Kelsey Museum.
bibl.note: Kelsey Museum, Inv. 94476. Linen and wool textile, from Egypt (l. 163 cm). - Curtain ["first life"]. - Shroud ["second life"]. - Objet d'Art [on the market, then in the Kelsey Museum, "third life"]. - Conclusions.
bibl.seg: Davis Powers Jessica, Curtain, Shroud, Work of Art: Three Lives of a Textile Artifact in the Kelsey Museum.

Kelsey Museum, Inv. 94476. Linen and wool textile, from Egypt (l. 163 cm). - Curtain ["first life"]. - Shroud ["second life"]. - Objet d'Art [on the market, then in the Kelsey Museum, "third life"]. - Conclusions.
